CLUE: It's linked to the Mediterranean by the Suez Canal
FOUND IN: Red Sea (as it meets directly with the Mediterraneamocean at the canal's entrance)

CLUE: Indicator on score of musical rhythm
FOUND IN: Time signature (notation indicating the number of beats in each bar and what note value is equivalent to one beat)
Hogs - correct; synonymous with pigs and can be used for adult ones.
Boodle (a term from the Dutch word 'boedeel', meaning stolen merchandise or booty)
Pantheon (Latin root "pan" means all, "theos" means god)
Resting in peace (a euphemism for being dead)
Pew (a long bench seats set parallel to the altar)
